Joplin.Gentry Apartments: The Gentry Apartments, also known as Zahn Apartments, is a historic apartment building located at Joplin, Jasper County, Missouri. It was built in 1918, and is a six-story, "U"-shaped, buff brick building. It measures approximately 45 feet by 120 feet and retains its original open storefront with large display windows and transoms.
